E N C O D E R S . N O T E S

SOURCE: TROUBLEMAKER 720P / MILLENIUM!!!!

ADDED NOTE: video was ok on the troublemaker release. at times the blacks pretty blocky so tried our best to fix white and blacks. tried to level out the contrast and brightness, rotated a bit, tweaked rgb smoothed just a hint then upped the sharp for a decnt detail. overall it's just a cam. pretty watchable

remember, unlike other encoders or release grps VAiN welcomes all honest feedback in the comments section. let it all out!!!

we don't need to add anymore inches to our e-peen 8===========================================D
